plays.text: Penalty to Jason Arnott 2 minutes for Holding Ryan Johnson

Goal scored by Scott Gomez assisted by Petr Sykora and Jason Arnott
Penalty to Bobby Holik 2 minutes for Tripping Pavel Bure
Penalty to Peter Worrell 2 minutes for Holding Petr Sykora
Goal scored by Patrik Elias assisted by Bobby Holik and Brian Rafalski
